title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin praises Patrick Mahomes for his approach to take less money in order to stay in contention for Super Bowls and why other star quarterbacks in the NFL should follow his lead. He believes the Cowboys and Jerry Jones are starting to turn into the dysfunctional Raiders and the late Al Davis. He also gives you his first Herd Hierarchy ranking the top 10 NFL teams based on what we've seen from training camp and 1 week of preseason games. Plus, Fox Sports college football analyst Joel Klatt joins the show to tell Colin which teams are serious contenders heading into the season. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
